slideshow.heading: Welcome to Palo Alto
slideshow.subheading: This subheading helps you provide some more detail to the title above.

faq.question: Question
faq.answer: Use this answer block to discuss some commonly asked questions you've discovered from your customers interactions. You could discuss product details, size fit, shipping policies, or anything you think would help merchants make an informed decision about your product or collection. This section will appear across all products.

blog.title: Blog post title
blog.excerpt: Once you create a blog post or choose a blog, its content will appear here.

testimonials.testimonial: Use this testimonial as an opportunity for your customers to discuss your brand and what sets you apart from the competition.
